segments.advisor_message: So, let’s chat a bit about your health. How would you describe your current state of health? Any issues we should know about?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, I mean, I don’t feel bad but I’ve got a couple of things going on. I smoke like, maybe, ten cigarettes a day. Been doing that since I was 18. My doctor said I could, you know, work on that but I haven’t yet. And, uh, I don’t think I need long-term care or anything, but just, you know, I should probably start looking into that stuff, huh?
